channel.title: Goudont V4 Shop help?!
channel.description:
ok. so. i made a new shop. the first 3 items say they cost beacon points. but i wont them all to cost coins. and the other items don't cost anything at all, and i am unable to buy them out of the shop. How would i make it to where they would all cost coins to buy? Please Help!
